tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Let's Play London 2012 Part 1 - With Geoff, Michael, Gavin and Ray
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Geoff, Michael, Gavin and Ray enter London each representing their countries. Who will walk out with the gold? Watch and find out!

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: What,﻿ Mario+Sonic didnt take the bullet so the real market wouldnt make an olympic game?

Mark Nutt is not﻿ a real person Gavin.
:(
LOL, its because of the comma﻿ that Gav wants that guy to suck on that.
Dude...Who﻿ honestly cares?
Ray's Puerto Rican, and﻿ because they're not a country the closest thing in the Olympics was Spain.
Am I the only guy who noticed the firkin drunk dude﻿ in the top left corner?
Vote﻿ up if you searched "maaark nuuut" and this came up first
why﻿ is rays flag puerto rico when hes playing for spain?
Suck my﻿ wheeeee XD
Weighlifting was in kg, 1pound is 0.5kg﻿ or so?
I say Michael won﻿ because he had most points and gold compared to Ray
NUTS AWAY﻿ !
LIKE TOTALLY﻿
cuz there was﻿ no puerto rico in the london game
ray is spain ﻿
Penis﻿ mouth
Did they notice the﻿ weightlifting was in kilograms. Michael's final weight was a little over 402 pounds.
he looks like the﻿ guy from "Its Always Sunny in Philadelphia"
Danny Devito. Yes, he's from Sunny in Philly. and Taxi. and he was the﻿ Penguin.
GAVIN﻿ FTW!!!!!!!!!!
TOILET﻿
MAAAAAAAAARK NUUUUUUUUUUTTTT﻿
Going back and watching this, hands﻿ down the funniest series I have seen! "Maaaaaark Nuuuuuut"
Michael is﻿ Danny DeVito

Reviewer.Movies: star wars, lord of the rings, borat, bruno, meet the spartans, the simpsons movie, delta farce
Reviewer.Music: system of a down, metallica, acdc, theory of a dead man, flyleaf, green day, breaking benjamin

Reviewer.Movies: "Ed, Edd, & Eddy", Skyline, The Tooth Fairy (Not the Dwayne Johnson one, the horror one with the witch who kils you if she gets your last Baby Tooth), Cloverfield, Signs (I'm serious), The 6th Sense, Gamer, How to be a serial killer (Horror comedy), Dr. Who (The David tennant version), Dinner for Schmucks, First encounters of the third kind, Paul, Coraline, The Truman Show (Jim Carrey), MAD (Cartoon network).
Reviewer.Music: Gorillaz, System Of A Down, Crystal Castles, Skrillex, Bjork (I kinda like bjork..).
